message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $180 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. Let's see if we can make a deal.
I understand that $180 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. Let's meet in the middle at $120. I think that's a fair price for this great product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $120 is still a bit high for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $90.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I'm starting to think you really want this product, Bob! I'm willing to come down a bit further to $110. I think that's a good compromise, and I'm confident you'll love the product.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but I'm still stuck at $90. I know you're trying to get more, but that's my absolute limit.  If you're not willing to go that low, I'll have to look at other options.

I understand you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $110 and $90, so I'll offer it to you for $100. Let's see if we can make a deal.

Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet me halfway, but $100 is still a bit more than I can comfortably pay. If you're willing to come down to $95, I'd be happy to finalize the deal. Otherwise, I might need to explore other options.

I'm not willing to go as low as $95, Bob. I'm willing to make one final offer to meet you in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $97.50. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
